mapper.sql: SELECT EMP_CD FROM StradeRollManage WHERE CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND TR_CD = #{TR_CD} AND EMP_CD IS NOT NULL

mapper.select: SELECT s.CO_CD ,s.TR_CD ,s.TR_NM ,s.USE_YN ,g.REG_NB ,g.PPL_NB ,g.CEO_NM ,g.BUSINESS ,g.JONGMOK ,g.ZIP ,g.ADDR ,g.ADDR_NUM ,g.PHONE_NB ,g.FAX ,g.WEBSITE ,g.EMAIL ,g.START_DT ,g.END_DT ,g.FOR_YN ,g.LIQ_CD FROM Strade s JOIN Gtrade g ON s.TR_CD = g.TR_CD AND s.CO_CD = g.CO_CD WHERE s.CO_CD = #{CO_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.TR_CD = #{TR_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT s.CO_CD ,s.TR_CD ,s.TR_NM ,s.USE_YN ,f.FSTART_DT ,f.FEND_DT ,f.BA_NB_TR ,f.DEPOSITOR ,f.DEPOSIT_NM ,f.ACCOUNT_OPEN_BN ,f.BANK_CD ,fn.BANK_NAME FROM Strade s JOIN Ftrade f ON s.TR_CD = f.TR_CD AND s.CO_CD = f.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN FINANCECODE fn ON f.BANK_CD = fn.FINANCE_CD WHERE s.CO_CD = #{CO_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.TR_CD = #{TR_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE Strade SET TR_NM = IFNULL(#{TR_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TR_NM) ,USE_YN = IFNULL(#{USE_YN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_YN) ,VIEW_YN = IFNULL(#{VIEW_YN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIEW_YN) WHERE TR_CD=#{TR_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CO_CD=#{CO_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE Gtrade SET REG_NB = IFNULL(#{REG_NB, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_NB) ,PPL_NB = IFNULL(#{PPL_NB, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PPL_NB) ,CEO_NM = IFNULL(#{CEO_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CEO_NM) ,BUSINESS = IFNULL(#{BUSINESS, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS) ,JONGMOK = IFNULL(#{JONGMOK, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JONGMOK) ,ZIP = IFNULL(#{ZIP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP) ,ADDR = IFNULL(#{ADDR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR) ,ADDR_NUM = IFNULL(#{ADDR_NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR_NUM) ,PHONE_NB = IFNULL(#{PHONE_NB, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NB) ,FAX = IFNULL(#{FAX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX) ,WEBSITE = IFNULL(#{WEBSITE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE) ,EMAIL = IFNULL(#{EMAIL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL) ,START_DT = IFNULL(#{START_DT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DT) ,END_DT = IFNULL(#{END_DT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DT) ,FOR_YN = IFNULL(#{FOR_YN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOR_YN) ,LIQ_CD = IFNULL(#{LIQ_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIQ_CD) WHERE TR_CD=#{TR_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CO_CD=#{CO_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE Ftrade SET FSTART_DT = IFNULL(#{FSTART_DT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSTART_DT) ,FEND_DT = IFNULL(#{FEND_DT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEND_DT) ,BA_NB_TR = IFNULL(#{BA_NB_TR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BA_NB_TR) ,DEPOSITOR = IFNULL(#{DEPOSITOR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSITOR) ,DEPOSIT_NM = IFNULL(#{DEPOSIT_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT_NM) ,ACCOUNT_OPEN_BN = IFNULL(#{ACCOUNT_OPEN_BN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_OPEN_BN) ,BANK_CD = IFNULL(#{BANK_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_CD) WHERE TR_CD=#{TR_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CO_CD=#{CO_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(MAX(minTr),'') != '' THEN LPAD( MIN(minTr) + 1, #{ctrNb} + ( CASE WHEN ( LENGTH( MIN(minTr) + 1 ) - #{ctrNb}) < 0 THEN '0' ELSE (LENGTH( MIN(minTr) + 1 ) - #{ctrNb}) END ), #{makeTrCd} ) ELSE LPAD( MAX(tr_cd) + 1, #{ctrNb} + ( CASE WHEN ( LENGTH( MAX(tr_cd) + 1 ) - #{ctrNb}) < 0 THEN '0' ELSE (LENGTH( MAX(tr_cd) + 1 ) - #{ctrNb}) END ), #{makeTrCd} ) END AS trCd FROM ( SELECT CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, IF(#{makeTrCd} = '0000000000', 1000000000, 9000000000)) AS INTEGER) AS tr_cd ,null AS minTr WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT tr_cd FROM Strade WHERE co_cd = #{coCd} AND LENGTH(tr_cd) = #{ctrNb}
AND tr_cd >= CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, '0000000000') as CHAR) AND tr_cd < CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, '9000000000') as CHAR)
AND tr_cd >= CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, '9000000000') as CHAR) AND tr_cd <= CAST(LPAD('9', #{ctrNb}, '9999999999') as CHAR)
AND CAST(tr_cd AS INTEGER) != 0 limit 1 ) UNION
SELECT CAST(tr_cd AS INTEGER) AS tr_cd ,(CASE WHEN LPAD(tr_cd + 1, #{ctrNb}, #{makeTrCd} ) = LEAD(tr_cd) OVER(ORDER BY tr_cd) = 0 THEN tr_cd ELSE null END ) AS minTr FROM Strade WHERE co_cd = #{coCd} AND LENGTH(tr_cd) = #{ctrNb}
AND tr_cd >= CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, '0000000000') as CHAR) AND tr_cd < CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, '9000000000') as CHAR)
AND tr_cd >= CAST(LPAD('0', #{ctrNb}, '9000000000') as CHAR) AND tr_cd <= CAST(LPAD('9', #{ctrNb}, '9999999999') as CHAR)
AND CAST(tr_cd AS INTEGER) != 0 ORDER BY tr_cd ) T
